headline: HONEYWELL ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend payment of $1.13 per share on the Company's common stock. The dividend is payable on June 6, 2025, out of surplus to holders of record at the close of business on May 16, 2025.

headline: Here’s Madison Dividend Income Fund’s Investment Thesis for Honeywell (HON)
summary: Madison Investments, an investment advisor, released its “Madison Dividend Income Fund” first-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here.
